conversation.message: Student_E, we recognize your persistent commitment and the urgency of finalizing placements in Round 7. Your dedication to School_E is evident. After careful re-evaluation of your profile and considering the highly competitive environment, we are pleased to inform you that we are extending an offer of admission at this time. We look forward to welcoming you to School_E. Please confirm your immediate acceptance.
conversation.thought: I am School_E, quota 1, in Round 7. My priority list is ['Student_A', 'Student_C', 'Student_B', 'Student_E', 'Student_D']. Student_E, my 4th priority, is applying for the third time. I have previously rejected Student_E twice, hoping to secure Student_A, Student_C, or Student_B. However, given that we are in Round 7 and I remain unmatched, the risk of holding out for a top-3 candidate (who rank School_E 4th or 5th) is becoming too high. Student_E is highly motivated and guarantees acceptance. Accepting Student_E secures a placement that is higher than my lowest priority (Student_D) and prevents the risk of failing to fill the quota entirely. It is time to secure the match.
